articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Pinterest adds controls to let you limit the amount of ‘AI slop’ in your feed - TechCrunch
articles.description: Pinterest is rolling out new controls that let users limit how much AI-generated content appears in their feeds. The company is also making its AI content labels more visible.
articles.content:
Following backlash over an increase in “AI slop” taking over users’ feeds, Pinterest on Thursday added new tools that let users limit how much AI-generated content they see on the platform.
